title: The Future of AI in Web Development
author: John Doe
summary: Explore how artificial intelligence is transforming the landscape of web development, from automated code generation to intelligent design tools.

title: Building Accessible Web Applications
author: Michael Brown
summary: Learn how to build web applications that are accessible to users with disabilities, following WCAG guidelines and best practices for semantic HTML, ARIA attributes, and keyboard navigation.
content: Accessibility is a crucial aspect of web development that ensures inclusivity...
